title: Yatri Partner (Kochi) (Driver)
description:
Welcome to the world of Yatri ride booking!
Experience the joy of driving with Yatri - India’s only 0% commission ride hailing app built in collaboration with drivers like yourself! Identify customers, make decisions, and advance by using the Yatri partner app, which is simple to use.  Yatri is dedicated to ensuring you and your passenger have a safe and hassle-free journey, without any commissions involved.
How does Yatri work for your customers?
Customers request a ride by selecting pickup and destination in our user-friendly Yatri customer app.
They are informed about the estimated fare before the ride
Customer confirms the booking, and voilà! They’ll Receive all the details about the ride and driver for the trip.
We proudly stand for:
Transparency: No hidden costs or surprises for you or your passenger; we keep it crystal clear
Direct payment to you: Customers pay you directly via UPI or cash. Our way of supporting the driver community by ensuring they get their dues directly, real time.
Fair ride fare: You can trust us for honest and reasonable pricing as set by the laws of the state.
We firmly say “no” to:
Commissions: Say goodbye to paying extra fees and charges that burden your earnings.
Service charges: No unnecessary service costs.
Surge pricing: We believe in fair pricing, no matter the demand. Pricing is decided by the state.
Hailing platforms: Our focus is solely on providing you the best experience through our app.
Our commitment to you:
Zero commissions: Your happiness is what drives us, not commissions!
Zero hidden costs: We believe in complete transparency throughout your journey.
Zero surge: No ups and downs in pricing; you get consistency and reliability.
How does Yatri work for you?
Yatri is currently available in all of Kerala. Setting up your driver account is easy. It takes a few minutes, and your DL and RC to get self on-boarded as a driver on Yatri. During the on-boarding process, if you face any issues, feel free to reach us directly.
Don’t wait any longer!
Download the Yatri partner (driver) app on the Google Play Store, and identify your customers in the city with ease!
Supported and backed by Yatri Open Mobility, ONDC, Beckn, JUSPAY.

summary: App for the drivers. Zero Commission. 100% Transparent.
recentChanges: Minor bug fixes and UI improvements
comments: App is great, and reasonable fares too But ... I am an online taxi driver, in my opinion the app should add a cancellation fee if the rider cancel the trip before the pickup . I got cancelled 3 times today on the way to the pickup location, my time and fuel gone for nothing. Please try to find a solution for this Thank you

Hi,   I just want to let you know that the Switch button that turn on the online status of the yatri service doesn't toggle when we swipe to turn on or off. Only click event is toggling the service.  Maybe using onCheckedChangedListener instead of onClickListener for the Switch will fix the problem.
its very difficult to get a trip on Yatri, still you guys are sending one trip request to more than one driver. please stop this.
I using a 4g phone I didn't get any trips from yatri, trips are only for iPhone users and 5g smartphones. Please change this system
ADVERTISING IN HYDERABAD,BUT THERE IS NO CHANCE FOR TS VEHICLES? NEED ONLY KL VEHICLE FOR REGISTRATION? GIVE ME CLARITY
